subject: Update docs to reflect correct architecture
body:
- Clarify system responsibilities: Fireblocks Console for admin tasks,
  Embedded SDK for user wallet ops, Unum API for certificate delivery
- Document user flows: deposit, withdraw, trade, purchase/sell fund
- Remove whitelisted_addresses from scope (admin manages in console)
- Update Phase 2/3 tasks to reflect what's actually built vs remaining
- Clean up outdated Unum API references

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Update docs to reflect correct architecture
